DOC.brief_summary: This is a single-centre prospective randomised study comparing the virological and histological response of HBV infection to lamivudine in combination with interferon versus lamivudine alone.
DOC.brief_title: Lamivudine Plus Interferon Versus Lamivudine For The Treatment Of HBeAg Positive Chronic Hepatitis B Virus (HBV)
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Untreated chronic hepatitis B patients with evidence of HBV replication as documented by serum HNVDNA positive within 3 months prior to entry and serum HBeAg positive at screening. Documented presence of abnormal alanine aminotransferase (ALT) (1.3 5X upper limit normal (ULN)) within 1 month prior to entry and signs of compensated liver disease. Exclusion criteria: Patients with any cause for liver disease other than chronic hepatitis B and evidence or history of decompensated liver disease.
